knimeNode.name: Google Analytics Connector (P&G)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Create a connection to the Google Analytics API.

fullDescription.intro:
Create a connection to the Google Analytics API.
Use "Get" buttons to navigate Account, WebProperty, View hierarchy to find the desired Profile ID - or if ID is already known - just input ID into Profile ID field.
View basic tutorial for Google Analytic Nodes on PGTube at http://pgtube.pg.com/pgtube/play.php?id=63625-22bc7d20d2a116d6
fullDescription.option: The profile ID that will be used for this connection.
(Advanced) The amount of time in minutes system will wait for results. If extremely large data sets or slow network this value can be increased.

ports.inPort: The Google API connection that will be used.
ports.outPort: A connection that can be used to access the Google Analytics API.
